toggle.heading: Here are the best colleges in the U.S.

hero.title: Best National University Rankings
hero.description: Schools in the National Universities category, such as the University of Chicago and Carnegie Mellon University, offer a full range of undergraduate majors, plus master's and doctoral programs. These colleges also are committed to producing groundbreaking research.
hero.subtitle: Here are the best colleges in the U.S.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT may not be required by school for some or all applicants, and in reporting SAT/ACT scores, the school did not include all students for whom it had scores, or refused to tell U.S. News whether all students with scores had been included.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT may not be required by school for some or all applicants, and in reporting SAT/ACT scores, the school did not include all students for whom it had scores, or refused to tell U.S. News whether all students with scores had been included.

items.blurb: Roosevelt University, located on campuses in Chicago and Schaumburg, Ill., is a private school that encourages its students to get involved with social justice. Part of Roosevelt’s mission is not only to educate but to also shape students to be socially conscious community leaders.

institution.aliasNames: Southern Illinois University Edwardsville Southern Illinois University Edwardsville

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT may not be required by school for some or all applicants, and in reporting SAT/ACT scores, the school did not include all students for whom it had scores, or refused to tell U.S. News whether all students with scores had been included.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT may not be required by school for some or all applicants, and in reporting SAT/ACT scores, the school did not include all students for whom it had scores, or refused to tell U.S. News whether all students with scores had been included.

items.blurb: Founded in 1957, Southern Illinois University Edwardsville is a public institution. The school has 51.2% of its classes with fewer than 20 students, and the student-faculty ratio at Southern Illinois University Edwardsville is 15:1.

institution.footnote: This school declined to fill out the U.S. News & World Report main statistical survey. Data that appears is from either what the school reported in previous years or from another source, such as the National Center for Education Statistics.

items.blurb: Founded in 1814, Spalding University is a private institution.

items.blurb: Founded in 1923, Stephen F. Austin State University is a public institution. Stephen F. Austin State University follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered selective.
Tennessee State University is a historically black institution just outside downtown Nashville. Famed TV personality Oprah Winfrey is one of the school's many notable graduates.

institution.aliasNames: Texas A & M University--Commerce Texas A and M University--Commerce Texas A&M University Commerce

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1889, Texas A&M University--Commerce is a public institution. Texas A&M University--Commerce offers a Greek system, where 1 percent of the student body is involved in a sorority and 2% is involved in a fraternity.

institution.aliasNames: Texas A & M University--Corpus Christi Texas A and M University--Corpus Christi Texas A&M University Corpus Christi

items.blurb: Founded in 1947, Texas A&M University--Corpus Christi is a public institution. Texas A&M University--Corpus Christi follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered selective.

institution.aliasNames: Texas A & M University--Kingsville Texas A and M University--Kingsville Texas A&M University Kingsville

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1925, Texas A&M University--Kingsville is a public institution. The school has 35.7% of its classes with fewer than 20 students, and the student-faculty ratio at Texas A&M University--Kingsville is 17:1.
Texas Southern University is one of the largest historically black colleges in the country. The university is located in downtown Houston.
Founded in 1899, Texas State University is a public institution. Texas State University follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered selective.

utag_data.stitial_fact: The most popular fields of study for international students in the U.S. are business and management and engineering.
